item.title: Only 24 hours left to vote in the #OpenStreetMap Foundation AGM! https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2023/Election_to_Board

@FOSSGISeV > With our large OSM community and many OSM users in Germany FOSSGIS e.V. sees our responsibility to help the global OSM community where we can. --J√∂rg Thomsen, chairperson of the FOSSGIS board of directors Thanks for your support.

FOSSGIS e.V., the German OSMF Local Chapter ( @FOSSGISeV ) has committed to providing annual financial support to the OpenStreetMap Foundation! üéâ https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/12/08/fossgis-e-v-commits-to-an-annual-gift-to-openstreetmap/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF #FOSSGIS

Don't forget to vote in the OSMF Board elections! You should have received your ballot via email. Some web extensions can break the ballot page and cause you to unwittingly ‚Äúvote for nothing‚Äù. Read more: https://osmfoundation.org/wiki/Annual_General_Meetings/2023/Voting_Information_and_Instructions

The OSMF AGM will take place at 16:00 UTC. Use this page <https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?msg=OSMF+17th+Annual+General+Meeting+-+9th+December+2023&iso=20231209T16&p1=1440> to see what time that is for you. Here's a countdown to when it starts: <https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?p0=1440&iso=20231209T16&msg=OSMF%2017th%20Annual%20General%20Meeting%20-%209th%20December%2020232>

The OSMF AGM will take place, like every year, on IRC, on the `#osmf-gm` channel on the OFTC network. You can join with a IRC client, using the web page, or via a Matrix client https://osmfoundation.org/wiki/Annual_General_Meetings/2023#Join

The Annual General Meeting of the OpenStreetMap Foundation will take place on Sat. 9th Dec. 2023, at 16:00 UTC. read more: https://osmfoundation.org/wiki/Annual_General_Meetings/2023 #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF

The #OpenStreetMap Operations team (@osm_tech) is seeking feedback on what sort of #OSM editing software should be included on OSM.org. draft policy on the forum: https://community.openstreetmap.org/t/proposal-osm-org-editor-inclusion-policy/106589 https://en.osm.town/@osm_tech/111500996659373393

Voting for the 2023 OSMF Board Election is now open! If you can vote, check your email for your ballot. Voting is open until 9 Dec 16:00UTC More details on the election: https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2023/Election_to_Board #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF
State of the Map Africa has kicked off. If you can't get there in person, you can watch the live stream: https://www.youtube.com/@sotmafrica #OpenStreetMap #OSM #SotMAfrica2023 #SotM
State of the Map Africa is taking place this week in Yaounde, Cameroon. Read more: https://2023.stateofthemap.africa/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM #SOTMAfrica

The manifestos from the #OSMF Board candidates (& their answers to the Q&A) has been published as usual, on the OSM wiki <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2023/Election_to_Board/Answers_and_manifestos> #OpenStreetMap #OSM
go out and map üòÅüòÅüòÅ
State of the Map Asia is happening in Bangkok in a few days @sotmasia #SotMAsia2023 #sotmasia <https://stateofthemap.asia/>

how it started : how it ended State of the Map Europe 2023 edition @sotmeu #OpenStreetMap #OSM #sotmeu Collage of two photos. Upper half is a jigsaw not done with slogan "how it started" Bottom half is the jigsaw done (it's a map) with caption "how it ended" In the the middle is the icon for state of the Map Europe 2023 icon
The follow what's happening at State of the Map Europe this weekend, you can follow the official account @sotmeu or the hashtag #sotmeu! üòÑüòÑüòÑ #OpenStreetMap #OSM
What are you mapping now? #OpenStreetMap #OSM #WeLoveMaps #Maps

Microsoft Pledges $150k to support OpenStreetMap! read more: <https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/10/25/microsoft-pledges-150k-to-support-openstreetmap/> #OpenStreetMap #OSM #gischat #maps #map #geo #microsoft

The OpenStreetMap Foundation is a global organisation for the main OpenStreetMap IP, but the OSMF can't do everything. Local Chapters are an important part of the OpenStreetMap project. Read more about how to become an OSMF Local Chapter: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/10/12/local-chapters-what-to-know-and-how-to-join/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM

And they're off! üèá! The #OpenStreetMap Foundation Board election in Dec. has 3 open seats, and 6 candidates. List of candidates: <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2023/Election_to_Board#List_of_board_candidates>
